title: Convoy East
description: The name Philip McCutchan stands with that of the celebrated Patrick O'Brian among the masters of the naval adventure novel. In 'CONVOY EAST', Commodore Kemp leads a group of ships from Britain into the Mediterranean. With a contingent of female officers aboard, he must proceed safely through a net of Luftwaffe and Italian navy forces to make safe harbor in Malta.
author: Philip McCutchan
